By Brittany Provost
May 25, 2022

A Whopping 30+ Artists Are Gearing Up to Play At ‘Délirium’ Festival Next Month

On Friday, June 10, 2022, through Saturday, June 11, 2022, Délirium is back for its highly-anticipated second edition. With the promise of 30+ artists, camping, sound camp, a huge fire, souvenirs, and more, you won't want to miss it!

May 20, 2022

Bytown Blog! & Ottawa Shufflers Community Presents 'Neon Nights'

Mark your calendars; on June 10, 2022, the Bytown Blog! and Ottawa Shufflers Community are teaming up for their first official EDM Rave! With the promise of a stacked local lineup, shuffle class, and a killer neon theme, you won't want to miss it!

Read more →
May 19, 2022

Champagne Drip Is Coming to Le Belmont in Montreal Next Weekend

On Saturday, May 28, 2022, Neptune Events will welcome the legendary Champagne Drip to Le Belmont in Montreal, Quebec. This will mark his debut performance in Quebec! Don't miss it.

Read more →
May 19, 2022

Come Celebrate HAMRO's Birthday at the Next Edition of ‘CLOSER’

On Friday, June 3, 2022, get ready for another edition of Hypeak Entertainment's praised CLOSER event. Some of Escapade Music Festival's biggest local talents will be taking the deck. Don't miss it!

Read more →
May 18, 2022

PicnicRoyal Festival Is Gearing Up to Welcome Teminite for His Canadian Debut

From July 1, 2022, through July 3, 2022, get ready for a bass camping festival of your dreams! Two acclaimed bass music companies, RoyalDub Productions and GnuckSquad, collaborated to bring you PicnicRoyal Festival! Trust us, you won't want to miss this one...
